AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: undocumented immigrants discovered at the immigration checkpoint stop, hidden in the tractor-trailer's sleeper area, testified against Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: alleged co-conspirator of Ramon De La Cruz, also requesting continuances, rode with Ramon De La Cruz in the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant arguing about the thirty-day exclusion period and its impact on the Speedy Trial Act violation, wore a blinking cellular Bluetooth Device and white clothing during the incident
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: individual who arranged to pay for smuggling, testified at Ramon De La Cruz's trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Eric Camacho: United States Border Patrol Agent testifying about smuggling practices and financial transactions involving smugglers
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's indictment: indictment against Ramon De La Cruz for alien transportation offenses, including conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain
